body_html:
Haven't followed through the discussion -- maybe take a look at
tf.sparse_add()?

On Thursday, September 8, 2016, Alexandre Passos notifications@github.com
wrote:

Yes, but that problem can be solved by doing a sparse_tensor_+= operator,
which is simpler to support than a sparse tensor variable.

—
